flavorText: The wisdom of the past is written on the bones of ancients.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Weisheit der Vergangenheit ist in die Knochen der Alten eingeritzt.
foreignData.name: Walderschütternde Chimäre
foreignData.text:
Alle Kreaturen, die die Walderschütternde Chimäre blocken können, tun dies.
Wenn die Walderschütternde Chimäre stirbt, ziehe drei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: La sabiduría del pasado está escrita en los huesos de los antiguos.
foreignData.name: Quimera sacudeárboles
foreignData.text:
Todas las criaturas que puedan bloquear a la Quimera sacudeárboles lo hacen.
Cuando la Quimera sacudeárboles muera, roba tres cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: La sagesse du passé est gravée sur les os des anciens.
foreignData.name: Chimère tremblebois
foreignData.text:
Toutes les créatures capables de bloquer la Chimère tremblebois le font.
Quand la Chimère tremblebois meurt, piochez trois cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: La saggezza del passato è scritta sulle ossa degli antichi.
foreignData.name: Chimera Scuotitronchi
foreignData.text:
Tutte le creature in grado di bloccare la Chimera Scuotitronchi lo fanno.
Quando la Chimera Scuotitronchi muore, pesca tre carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 往昔の知恵は、古きものの骨に刻まれている。
foreignData.name: 大樹揺らしのキマイラ
foreignData.text:
大樹揺らしのキマイラをブロックできるクリーチャーはすべて、これをブロックする。
大樹揺らしのキマイラが死亡したとき、カードを３枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — キマイラ

foreignData.flavorText: 과거의 지혜는 고대인들의 뼈 위에 쓰여진다.
foreignData.name: 나무를 흔드는 키메라
foreignData.text:
나무를 흔드는 키메라를 방어할 수 있는 모든 생물은 그렇게 한다.
나무를 흔드는 키메라가 죽을 때, 카드 세 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A sabedoria do passado está escrita nos ossos dos antigos.
foreignData.name: Quimera Farfalhante
foreignData.text:
Todas as criaturas aptas a bloquear Quimera Farfalhante o fazem.
Quando Quimera Farfalhante morrer, compre três cards.

foreignData.flavorText: Мудрость прошлого записана на костях древних.
foreignData.name: Химера Трясущихся Деревьев
foreignData.text:
Все существа, способные блокировать Химеру Трясущихся Деревьев, блокируют ее.
Когда Химера Трясущихся Деревьев умирает, возьмите три карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 往昔智慧全都刻进了祖兽骨头里。
foreignData.name: 撼树盖美拉
foreignData.text:
所有能够阻挡撼树盖美拉的生物皆须阻挡之。
当撼树盖美拉死去时，抓三张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 往昔智慧全都刻進了祖獸骨頭裡。
foreignData.name: 撼樹蓋美拉
foreignData.text:
所有能夠阻擋撼樹蓋美拉的生物皆須阻擋之。
當撼樹蓋美拉死去時，抽三張牌。

name: Treeshaker Chimera
originalText:
All creatures able to block Treeshaker Chimera do so.
When Treeshaker Chimera dies, draw three cards.

rulings.text: If a creature can't block Treeshaker Chimera for any reason (such as being tapped), then it doesn't block. If there's a cost associated with having it block, the player isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to block in that case either. If there's a cost associated with having it block Treeshaker Chimera, but not to block other attacking creatures, that creature is free to block one of those other creatures or to not block at all.
If a creature is required to block two or more different creatures, its controller chooses which one that creature blocks.

text:
All creatures able to block Treeshaker Chimera do so.
When Treeshaker Chimera dies, draw three cards.
